test_name: CDRSUM must be equal to the sum of MEMORY, ORIENT, JUDGMENT, COMMUN, HOMEHOBB, PERSCARE if subqestions are not 99
short_desc: If all of (MEMORY, ORIENT, JUDGMENT, COMMUN, HOMEHOBB, PERSCARE) ne 99, CDRSUM must = sum(MEMORY, ORIENT, JUDGMENT, COMMUN, HOMEHOBB, PERSCARE)
full_desc: If all of Q1. MEMORY, Q2. ORIENT, Q3. JUDGMENT, Q4. COMMUN, Q5. HOMEHOBB, Q6. PERSCARE ne 99, Q7. CDRSUM (CDR sum of boxes) must be equal to the sum of Q1. MEMORY, Q2. ORIENT, Q3. JUDGMENT, Q4. COMMUN, Q5. HOMEHOBB, Q6. PERSCARE
test_logic: If all of (MEMORY, ORIENT, JUDGMENT, COMMUN, HOMEHOBB, PERSCARE) ne 99 and CDRSUM ne sum(MEMORY, ORIENT, JUDGMENT, COMMUN, HOMEHOBB, PERSCARE)
comp_vars: CDRSUM, MEMORY, ORIENT, JUDGEMENT, COMMUN, HOMEHOBB, PERSCARE

test_name: CDRSUM cannot have valid response if MEMORY, ORIENT, JUDGMENT, COMMUN, HOMEHOBB, or PERSCARE are missing (99)
short_desc: If (MEMORY=99 or ORIENT=99 or JUDGMENT=99 or COMMUN=99 or HOMEHOBB=99 or PERSCARE=99) then CDRSUM must =99
full_desc: If any of Q1. MEMORY, Q2. ORIENT, Q3. JUDGMENT, Q4. COMMUN, Q5. HOMEHOBB, Q6. PERSCARE are missing (99), then Q7. CDRSUM (CDR sum of boxes) must = 99
test_logic: IF (MEMORY=99 or ORIENT=99 or JUDGMENT=99 or COMMUN=99 or HOMEHOBB=99 or PERSCARE=99) and CDRSUM ne 99
comp_vars: CDRSUM, MEMORY, ORIENT, JUDGEMENT, COMMUN, HOMEHOBB, PERSCARE

test_name: CDRGLOB cannot have valid response if MEMORY, ORIENT, JUDGMENT, COMMUN, HOMEHOBB, or PERSCARE are missing (99)
short_desc: If (MEMORY=99 or ORIENT=99 or JUDGMENT=99 or COMMUN=99 or HOMEHOBB=99 or PERSCARE=99) then CDRGLOB must =99
full_desc: If any of Q1. MEMORY, Q2. ORIENT, Q3. JUDGMENT, Q4. COMMUN, Q5. HOMEHOBB, Q6. PERSCARE are missing (99), then Q8. CDRGLOB (CDR global score) must = 99
test_logic: IF (MEMORY=99 or ORIENT=99 or JUDGMENT=99 or COMMUN=99 or HOMEHOBB=99 or PERSCARE=99) and CDRGLOB ne 99
comp_vars: CDRGLOB, MEMORY, ORIENT, JUDGEMENT, COMMUN, HOMEHOBB, PERSCARE

test_name: IF CDRGLOB= 0 or 0.5 then the uncorrected total MoCA score should not be <4
short_desc: If RMMODEC2C2T=2 or blank and MOCATOTS <4, then CDRGLOB should not equal 0 or 0.5
full_desc: If Form C2 Q1f. MOCATOTS (uncorrected MoCA total score) <4 then Q8. CDRGLOB (CDR global score) should not equal 0 or 0.5 (No or questionable impairment)
test_logic: If RMMODEC2C2T=2 or blank and MOCATOTS <4 and CDRGLOB = (0, 0.5)

test_name: IF CDRGLOB= 0 or 0.5 then the uncorrected total MoCA blind score should not be <4
short_desc: If RMMODEC2C2T=1 and MOCBTOTS <4, then CDRGLOB should not equal 0 or 0.5
full_desc: If Form C2T Q1d. MOCBTOTS (uncorrected MoCA blind total score) <4 then Q8. CDRGLOB (CDR global score) should not equal 0 or  0.5 (No or questionable impairment)
test_logic: If RMMODEC2C2T=1 and MOCBTOTS <4 and CDRGLOB = (0, 0.5)
questions: Should the MOCA blind value for this alert still be <4 or lower since the MOCA blind total score is lower?

short_desc: If DECCLCOG=0 then CDRGLOB should not equal 2 or 3
full_desc: If Form B9 Q8. DECCLCOG (Impaired cognition per clinician) =0 (No) then B4 Q8. CDRGLOB (CDR global score) should not equal 2 or 3 (moderate or severe impairment)

short_desc: If DECCLCOG=1 then CDRGLOB should not equal 0
full_desc: If Form B9 Q8. DECCLCOG (Impaired cognition per clinician) =1 (Yes) then B4 Q8. CDRGLOB (CDR global score) should not equal 0 (no impairment)

short_desc: If COGMEM=0 then MEMORY should not equal 2 or 3
full_desc: If Form B9 Q9a. COGMEM (Memory)=0 then B4 Q1. MEMORY (Memory) should not equal 2 or 3 (moderate or severe impairment)

short_desc: If COGMEM=1 then MEMORY should not equal 0
full_desc: If Form B9 Q9a. COGMEM (Memory) = 1 (Yes) then B4 Q1. MEMORY (Memory) should not equal 0 (No impairment)

short_desc: If COGORI=0 then ORIENT should not equal 2 or 3
full_desc: If Form B9 Q9b. COGORI (Orientation) = 0 (No) then B4 Q2. ORIENT (Orientation) should not equal 2 or 3 (moderate or severe impairment)

short_desc: If COGORI=1 then ORIENT should not equal 0
full_desc: If Form B9 Q9b. COGORI (Orientation) = 1 (yes) then B4 Q2. ORIENT (Orientation) shoudl not equal 0 (No impairment)

short_desc: If COGJUDG=0 then JUDGMENT should not equal 2 or 3
full_desc: If Form B9 Q9c. COGJUDG (Executive function) = 0 (No) then B4 Q3. JUDGMENT (Judgment) should not equal 2 or 3 (moderate or severe impairment)

short_desc: If COGJUDG=1 then JUDGMENT should not equal 0
full_desc: If Form B9 Q9c. COGJUDG (Executive function) = 1 (yes) then B4 Q3. JUDGMENT (Judgment) should not equal 0 (No impairment)

short_desc: If DEMENTED=1 then CDRGLOB should not equal 0 or 0.5
full_desc: If Form D1a Q3. DEMENTED (Demented) = 1 (Yes) then B4 Q8. CDRGLOB (CDR global score) should not equal 0 or 0.5 (No or questionable impairment)

short_desc: If NORMCOG=1 then CDRGLOB should equal 0
full_desc: If Form D1a Q2. NORMCOG (Normal cognition) =1 (Yes) then B4 Q8. CDRGLOB (CDR global score) should equal 0

short_desc: If NORMCOG = 1 then CDRSUM should be <=5
full_desc: If Form D1a Q2. NORMCOG (Normal cognition)= 1 (Yes) then B4 Q7. CDRSUM (CDR sum of boxes) should be <= 5

short_desc: If COGLANG=0 then CDRLANG should not equal 2 or 3
full_desc: If Form B9 Q9d. COGLANG (Language)  = 0 (no) then B4 Q10. CDRLANG (Language) should not equal 2 or 3 (moderate or severe impairment)

short_desc: If COGLANG =1 then CDRLANG should not equal 0
full_desc: If Form B9 Q9d. COGLANG (Language) = 1 (yes) then B4 Q10. CDRLANG (Language) sould not equal 0 (No impairment)

short_desc: CDRGLOB should not decrease by 1 or more points from CDRGLOB[UDSv3]
full_desc: Q8. CDRGLOB (CDR global score) should not decrease by 1 or more points from the most recent visit
